original: 君主命令與君主智力有關，命令上限會隨著勢力武將數量而增加。命令現值：為目前剩餘命令數，工作結束回復命令。命令上限／最大上限：降低命令上限，可用於加速輔臣。不加速時有最大上限。
text: The monarch's command is related to the monarch's intelligence, and the upper limit of the command will increase with the number of generals. Command present value:  it is the number of remaining commands at present, and the command is replied when the work is over. Command upper limit/maximum upper limit:  reduce the command upper limit, which can be used to accelerate the minister. There is a maximum upper limit when not accelerating.
